text: @realDonaldTrump LIFE, FOREMOST, is required for liberty, pursuit of happiness & Civil Rights to exist. COVID-19 is smart, adapting, surviving & replicating.  Your strategy is to exploit rights and emotions to combat lethal intelligence that encompasses microscopic to global?     ByeDon!!
